name: A1C
instructions: Puncture the finger with a lancet to obtain the FIRST DROP of blood

name: Hemoglobin
instructions: Puncture the finger with a lancet and obtain 2-3 DROPS of blood

name: Glucose
instructions: To perform a glucose test, first prepare your glucose meter and insert a test strip if needed. Clean your finger with an alcohol swab and let it dry. Use a lancing device to prick the side of your fingertip and gently squeeze to obtain a drop of blood. Use the second drop of blood for testing. Apply the second drop to the test strip according to the meter’s instructions and wait for the meter to display your blood glucose level.
supplies: HemoCue Glucose Cuvettes from the Fridge

name: Sputum Instructions
subtitle: Morning Sputum Collection Instructions:
subtitle4: Medical Assistant Guide: Preparing Sputum for Patients
subheading: Grab 3 Specimen Bags: Each bag should contain
bulletPoints: Collect sputum immediately after waking up.
Do not brush your teeth or drink water beforehand.
Ensure sputum (not saliva) reaches the line 5 mark on the tube.
If needed, keep coughing until the mucus reaches the line.
After collecting the mucus, place the sputum sample and the requisition form in the provided bag.
Store the bag in a regular refrigerator.
bulletPoints2: Sunday, Monday, and Tuesday (Drop off on Tuesday at clinic)
Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday (Drop off on Thursday at clinic)
bulletPoints3: A completed public health form signed by the doctor
Label each bag with the numbers 1, 2, and 3, as well as the collection date.
bulletPoints4: Include the patient's first and last name
bulletPoints5: Place a copy of the public health form in the medical records box for scanning

name: ER Transportation
instructions: To perform a glucose test, first prepare your glucose meter and insert a test strip if needed. Clean your finger with an alcohol swab and let it dry. Use a lancing device to prick the side of your fingertip and gently squeeze to obtain a drop of blood. Use the second drop of blood for testing. Apply the second drop to the test strip according to the meter’s instructions and wait for the meter to display your blood glucose level.
